headline: Proxy season culture war: Republicans urge investors to vote against 'woke' big business like Disney
author: Jessica Guynn
sentences: At the Wells Fargo annual meeting in April, a conservative activist presented a shareholder proposal that would force the bank to disclose more information about its charitable giving and warned company leaders against engaging in the kind of LGBTQ advocacy that prompted Florida Gov.
Conservative groups have submitted a record number of shareholder proposals: 43, up from 16 in 2021.
Calling the effort a fight for corporate America," conservatives are challenging 'woke' policies.
The shareholder activism got a boost from the faceoff between Walt Disney and Florida Gov.
Ron DeSantis to repeal Walt Disneys special tax privileges just days earlier.
